ing: 1/2 cup KRAFT All Natural Peanut Butter
2 tablespoons MAXWELL HOUSE Original Roast Coffee
des: "Try our super easy and super yummy recipe for Awake Peanut Butter Snack Bites. Ground coffee and chunks of white and semi-sweet chocolate create a wonderful mocha flavour."
ins:
Mix together all ingredients in a medium bowl until blended. Refrigerate for 20 to 30 min.
Roll into 20 (1-inch) balls, using about 2 Tbsp. for each.
